mapper.select: select r.room_no,room_name from chat_room r,chat_room_join j where r.room_no=j.room_no and member_no=#{member_no}
mapper.insert: insert into chat_message values((select nvl(max(message_no),0)+1 from chat_message),#{message},sysdate,#{member_no},#{room_no},null)
insert into chat_message values((select nvl(max(message_no),0)+1 from chat_message),null,sysdate,#{member_no},#{room_no},#{chat_image})
mapper.select: select message_no,message,time,member_nickname,room_no,chat_image from chat_message c,member m where m.member_no=c.member_no and room_no=#{room_no} order by message_no
